articles.title: Pd and Audio Programming in the 21st Century

title: pileup~
description: The `pileup~` object performs spectral persistence by maintaining amplitude and phase information in frequency bins. It can resynthesize audio using an oscillator bank, allowing for control over low/high frequencies, transposition, and a synthesis threshold. It also features options for spectral "feedback" and various persistence modes (amplitude/phase, amplitude only, inverse).
